descriptions.user_org_creation: Any user can create an organization
descriptions.private_domain_creation: An Org Manager can create private domains for that organization
descriptions.app_bits_upload: Space Developers can upload app bits
descriptions.app_scaling: Space Developers can perform scaling operations (i.e. change memory, disk, or instances)
descriptions.route_creation: Space Developers can create routes in a space
descriptions.service_instance_creation: Space Developers can create service instances in a space
descriptions.diego_docker: Space Developers can push Docker apps
descriptions.set_roles_by_username: Org Managers and Space Managers can add roles by username
descriptions.unset_roles_by_username: Org Managers and Space Managers can remove roles by username
descriptions.task_creation: Space Developers can create tasks on their application. This feature is under development
descriptions.env_var_visibility: All users can view environment variables
descriptions.space_scoped_private_broker_creation: Space Developers can create space-scoped private service brokers
descriptions.space_developer_env_var_visibility: Space Developers can view their v2 environment variables. Org Managers and Space Managers can view their v3 environment variables

feature-flags.error: An error occurred retrieving feature flag metadata.
